Title: His Name Was... Stormstout
Description:
An unusual pandaren came through town a few days back. He told a better tale than Pan, drank twice as much as Lee, and then beat me up in front of the bar. All while his little niece made fun of us.

It was awesome.

They said they were headed to the Valley of the Four Winds. You should meet him! Just... watch out for that right hook.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Chen Stormstout at the Thunderfoot Fields in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText:
Ha ha! You were sent by Bolo? The "Keg Mender," right? From the Drunken Hozen?

How is his eye healing? Is his friend still hung over?

Ahh... that was an enjoyable evening.
